Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.espian.showcaseview.ShowcaseView.ConfigOptions.insert
    not compatible with Target API
    com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library.PullToRefreshBase.Mode.PULL_DOWN_TO_REFRESH
    Use PullToRefreshBase.Mode.PULL_FROM_START from now on.
    com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library.PullToRefreshBase.Mode.PULL_UP_TO_REFRESH
    Use PullToRefreshBase.Mode.PULL_FROM_END from now on.

    See PullToRefreshBase.setScrollingWhileRefreshingEnabled(boolean)
    com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library.PullToRefreshBase.setLastUpdatedLabel(CharSequence)
    You should now call this method on the result of PullToRefreshBase.getLoadingLayoutProxy().
    com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library.PullToRefreshBase.setLoadingDrawable(Drawable)
    You should now call this method on the result of PullToRefreshBase.getLoadingLayoutProxy().

    You should now call this method on the result of PullToRefreshBase.getLoadingLayoutProxy(boolean, boolean).
    com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library.PullToRefreshBase.setPullLabel(CharSequence)
    You should now call this method on the result of PullToRefreshBase.getLoadingLayoutProxy().
    com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library.PullToRefreshBase.setPullLabel(CharSequence, PullToRefreshBase.Mode)
    You should now call this method on the result of PullToRefreshBase.getLoadingLayoutProxy(boolean, boolean).
    com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library.PullToRefreshBase.setPullToRefreshEnabled(boolean)
    This simple calls setMode with an appropriate mode based on the passed value.
    com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library.PullToRefreshBase.setRefreshingLabel(CharSequence)
    You should now call this method on the result of PullToRefreshBase.getLoadingLayoutProxy().
    com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library.PullToRefreshBase.setRefreshingLabel(CharSequence, PullToRefreshBase.Mode)
    You should now call this method on the result of PullToRefreshBase.getLoadingLayoutProxy(boolean, boolean).

    com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library.PullToRefreshBase.setReleaseLabel(CharSequence, PullToRefreshBase.Mode)
    You should now call this method on the result of PullToRefreshBase.getLoadingLayoutProxy(boolean, boolean).
    com.espian.showcaseview.ShowcaseView.setShowcaseIndicatorScale(float)
    Use setScaleMultiplier
    com.espian.showcaseview.ShowcaseView.setShowcaseItem(int, int, Activity)
    com.espian.showcaseview.ShowcaseView.setShowcaseNoView()
    Use setShowcase() with the target ShowcaseView.NONE
    com.espian.showcaseview.ShowcaseView.setShowcasePosition(float, float)
    use setShowcase with a PointTarget
    com.espian.showcaseview.ShowcaseView.setShowcasePosition(Point)
    This will soon become private. Use setShowcase with a PointTarget
    com.espian.showcaseview.ShowcaseView.setShowcaseView(View)
    Use setShowcase with a ViewTarget
